title: Burn Mines - Proof of Burn Smart Contract System
author: Tokenista / VanKushFamily.com

core_concept.name: Burn Mining
core_concept.description: Smart contract mechanism where users 'sacrifice' existing tokens to mint a more rare, valuable, or utility-driven token
core_concept.bridge: Bridges traditional Proof of Burn (PoB) with modern DeFi yield farming and social media rewards

fueling_the_mine.action: Tokens sent to a smart contract

the_burn.mechanism: Tokens permanently locked or sent to a burn address (0x000...)
the_burn.effect: Increases Total Value Locked (TVL) and creates deflationary pressure on the 'fuel' token

the_reward.mechanism: User receives a 'Hash Rate' in the mine
the_reward.result: Allows minting new tokens over time

proof_of_dues_subscription.description: Burn mines act as gateway for premium services
use_cases: Users burn tokens to 'subscribe' to content creators (Vloggers, YouTubers)

bridge_tokens_peggys.flow: Users earn on Steemit, move tokens to Tron, trade on SunSwap

social_media_bots.function: Distribute tokens based on social interaction, which can then be fed into Burn Mines

key_functions._mint: Creating new tokens for the miner
key_functions._burnFrom: Allowing the contract to burn tokens from a user's allowance

charity_burns_debate.suggestion: Option where 'burned' tokens go to charity
charity_burns_debate.criticism: If a charity spends the tokens, they aren't actually burned because they remain in circulation

complexity_vs_utility.question: Why burn a mainstream token (like TRX or BTC) to mint a platform-specific token instead of just using the mainstream token directly?

tokenista_response.clarification: Purpose is to create Locked Value and a 'Booster Club' incentive
tokenista_response.mechanism: Act of burning reduces supply and raises the floor price for all holders

january_2022.event: 'Burn Mine' concept formally proposed on the forum

march_2022.event: Plans for inflationary rewards system designed to become 'Locked Value' announced

may_2024.event: VanKushFamily.com announces official opening of first Proof of Burn (PoB) Smart Contract
may_2024.significance: Moving project from theory to live execution

concepts_connected: Reverse Satoshi Model (page 14 of DeFi thread)

deflationary_pressure.mechanism: Each burn permanently removes tokens from circulation

locked_value.concept: Burned tokens contribute to Total Value Locked (TVL)

booster_club_incentive.description: Early burners benefit from subsequent burns
booster_club_incentive.mechanism: Floor price rises as supply decreases

key_insights.burn_as_commitment: Burning tokens demonstrates long-term commitment to the ecosystem
key_insights.subscription_model: Burns can replace traditional subscription fees with token mechanics
key_insights.cross_chain_utility: Bridge tokens (Peggys) enable earning on one chain and trading on another
key_insights.real_world_integration: SoapBox/CandleBox provide physical product utility for digital tokens
